snippet: More than 35 people were killed in Shiite areas of Baghdad and in northern Iraq on Wednesday as tensions between minority Sunni Muslims and Shiites escalated.
abstract: Bombings in Shiite areas of Baghdad and in northern Iraq kill more than 35 people, after weeks of violence by Sunni Islamist insurgents determined to set off sectarian confrontations.
lead_paragraph: More than 35 people were killed in Shiite areas of Baghdad and in northern Iraq on Wednesday as tensions between minority Sunni Muslims and Shiites escalated.

headline.seo: Bombings Kill Many Iraqis in Shiite Areas
headline.main: Bombings Kill Many Iraqis in Shiite Areas
headline.print_headline: Bombings Kill Many Iraqis In Shiite Areas
